name: Whale Survival Simulator 3D - Ocean animal survival simulator
name_original: Whale Survival Simulator 3D - Ocean animal survival simulator
description:
Become a big whale!
Explore the ocean among ice fields in search of food. In Whale Survival Simulator 3D you need not behave like a man. Kill, eat and breath! Control your oxygen level. Fight with every predator or run away. Level­up your own animal to improve survival skills. Form a powerful pod and breed another whale. Be afraid of harpoons!

Features of Whale Survival Simulator 3D:

- Violent predators
- Harsh whale catchers
- Survival and quests mode
- Northern landscapes
- Cruel ocean atmosphere
- Many animal species
- Whale groups
- Limited oxygen

Explore the ocean and avoid the whale catchers! They are looking for you among the ice blocks. You are a giant animal, but your life is full of danger! Start your ice adventures with our simulator right now. Turn on a survival mode and fight for your life. Knock down every predator you meet in the ocean.

Have you ever imagined how hard the life of the whale? With our simulator you have a chance to check it. Try it right now! Hunt, eat, jump out of the ocean for oxygen and never sleep. Who knows what predator may hide behind the ice?! There are a lot of them in the ocean.

This survival simulator is not easy, make your own whale pod, explore the ocean not alone. Breed another whale. Your animal mates will follow you through the ocean ice. But be careful, in this simulator they can die. Think how to support the survival of your team. And don't forget about yourself.

There are a map and tips in the simulator. Convenient controls allow you to turn, hunt, jump, etc. Try how to ride your animal, eat and kill. Explore all places and do many other things among the ice rocks.

North Whale Survival Simulator allows you to be in whale's skin as if you are a real ocean animal. No sun, no luck. A pure survival among the ice. Wait... Hear? It is the ocean is calling for you.

We can't wait when you start playing Whale Survival Simulator 3D!
